page.title: 13Shopping 1
page.content: There are three types of shop in East Halton. They are a Fish and Chip shop, a Newsagents and two General Stores. The Fish and Chip shop sells hot fish and chips and is open at lunch times and in the evenings most days except Sunday. In the last few years it has had several owners but has closed down with each owner after a few months or years. The Newsagents is called Haven Newsagents and sells many things such as toys, drinks, sweets, comics, crisps, pens, writing materials, newspapers and cigarettes. It is open from 5.30 a.m. to 6.00 p.m. every day except Saturday and Sunday when it closes for Half Day.
